attributes.action: Create strict legal controls to restrict the use of Gas Auditory Bird Scarers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Due to the ever increasing number of public complaints regarding the misuse by farmers of gas bird scarers,  there should be strict legal controls on their use.
At present local councils have no power to restrict or prevent their use, causing detrimental effects on local communities.
NFU code of practice is being ignored on a wide scale and needs to be replaced.
Regulations should include: Restricted times of use, limitation of shots, amount of scarers in any given area. Registration with local councils. Encouragement to adopt alternative methods of bird control.
